entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -10.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 12:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to ice pellets or periods of snow late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
